price: Adεn na kuro biara annye annie amma ne gyidie no ho amma mfasoͻ amma no? Gyesε Yona nkorͻfoͻ no (nko ara). Ɛberε a wͻgye diiε no Yɛyii animguaseε asotwee no firii wͻn so wͻ wiase asetena yi mu, na Yεmaa wͻtenaa ase gyee wͻn ani kͻpem εberε bi.
arabic: فَلَوۡلَا كَانَتۡ قَرۡيَةٌ ءَامَنَتۡ فَنَفَعَهَآ إِيمَٰنُهَآ إِلَّا قَوۡمَ يُونُسَ لَمَّآ ءَامَنُواْ كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخِزۡيِ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَمَتَّعۡنَٰهُمۡ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falawlā kānat qaryatun āmanat fanafaʿahā īmānuhā illā qawma yūnusa lammā āmanū kashafnā ʿanhum ʿadhāba al-khiz'yi fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wamattaʿnāhum ilā ḥīnin
